name: react4xp-mono
description: React4xp monorepo for all NPM dependencies

scripts.setup: npm i && npm run npmClean && npm run npmInstall
scripts.npmInstall: lerna run --scope react4xp-buildconstants npmInstall && lerna run --scope react4xp-regions npmInstall && lerna run npmInstall

author: Espen Norderud
